page.title: 15Rose and Portcullis Inn
page.content: The tenant has owned the public house for 6 years.The pub dates back to the 16 century.Once the pub had been called{The New Inn}when first opened. The reason for its crest is that it was owned first by{Neville Greenville family who were Squires of the village.The present tenant employes 10 people including his wife.All sorts of people have come to the pub including {Oliver Reed.}Of course more men drink than women.Approximately on a weekend night 100 people visit this pub.Bitter is the most popular order while Gin and Scotch tie for the most popular spirit.They order every week for 5-6 barrels (1 per night).They sell{ {different}types of beer,courage and international beers from Australia and Singapore and traditional English beers.The tenant rents the building.
